system.description: • Charm: Vampires can use the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.Puppet]{puppet} power on those attracted to them (GM’s call) using their @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor01charac.JournalEntryPage.01traits00000000]{Smarts} as their @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.swadecor05powers.JournalEntryPage.05arcanebackgr00]{arcane skill}. They can cast and maintain the power indefinitely, but may only affect one target at a time.
